price: 65. Umman tet addal waarak, awlaytu mageyaanaay, cateyna mageyan.
arabic: خَٰلِدِينَ فِيهَآ أَبَدٗاۖ لَّا يَجِدُونَ وَلِيّٗا وَلَا نَصِيرٗا

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: khālidīna fīhā abadan lā yajidūna waliyyan walā naṣīran
